mapper.select: SELECT task_id, type, input_info, output_info, enabled, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time), '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(update_time), '%Y-%m-%d') update_time FROM endecrypt_task_config ORDER BY create_time, update_time

SELECT task_id, type, input_info, output_info, enabled, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time), '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(update_time), '%Y-%m-%d') update_time FROM endecrypt_task_config WHERE task_id = #{taskId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
